website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for kids and parents wanting to keep young hands protected during casual dirt bike riding.
pros: Specifically portioned for younger hand sizes
Palms have a good amount of grip for most dirt bike handlebars
cons: Gloves can easily rip during or after heavy riding

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought two pairs blue and red for my 5 and 9 year olds and although these look a bit big they are not. They fit comfortably, and unfortunately my boys tend to be super picky about the way things fit on them. They were excited to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jet A.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: these are nice gloves for a child. They fit for a change. It is difficult to find quality gloves that are small enough for little hands.
customer_reviews.author: Skypilot 18

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Was impressed with the quality for the cost. My son loves them and has yet to mention any discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: LMB Motorsports

customer_reviews.title: Son loved them
customer_reviews.text: There were some many kinds - these worked perfectly and my son loves them
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda's person

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: These go really well with the dirt bike I bought my 10 year old son for Christmas. They are thick and feel like a great quality product. These will definitely protect him from any potential blisters or scrapes.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMommaBee

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great glove for the price. Beats paying more for a Fox glove that the boys will just loose and they are the same quality. Glad I bought multiple pair!
customer_reviews.author: Lance Shreves

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and really help grip the bars. Does not constrict your hands to not move, and it easy to grab things such as your phone, water bottle, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Birthday child seemed to like them.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift. Birthday child seemed to like them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Hands Warm
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my grandson to wear when he is riding his new Razor 500. He said that they kept his hands warm and did not deter his control of the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Iris N. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Very weak performance
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this very weak performance. It is better to buy something more expensive but will the child was for longer. Too small for my 9 year old son.
customer_reviews.author: forever

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 7 year-old son along with the helmet and goggles. He uses them to ride his bike, and really enjoys them. Good product for the price. Perfect for his age.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in combination with the off-road goggles & the gear helmet. The colors match perfectly. My son loves it.They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: alexishall

customer_reviews.title: gloves are great for price
customer_reviews.text: The gloves seem to be of good quality and the price was great. The only draw back is that they came in only one size and since my son is on the younger side they are a bit big on him.
customer_reviews.author: mama1

customer_reviews.title: TMS Youth Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids loved them. Every time they get on the little dirt bikes they have to have their gloves on. It was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were delivered quickly and are very good quality. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fit it a little funny but hes wears them anyway
customer_reviews.text: Okay, fit it a little funny but hes wears them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: sarah jo carroll

customer_reviews.title: Racing gloves
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son wears these for snocross racing. They are a little big, but he is still able to wear them. I would recommend these to others.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Raver

customer_reviews.title: All but the size
customer_reviews.text: The color and delivery time were as expected but I guess we figured the size wrong or something bc they turned out to be too big! haha
customer_reviews.author: MeKatieLee

customer_reviews.title: Fit is good.
customer_reviews.text: These fit my daughter well and will do there job protecting her at her skill level. They are what you are paying for.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Awsome. kid loved them.great.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and bright red.Good quality.my 9 year old boy loved them.It was a hit.i would recamend this item.great.might buy a second pair for me lol.
customer_reviews.author: Spaceoddessy1

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: These are nice made gloves, worth the money. Daughter loves them and her new helmet.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: These were just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice sized gloves for my little grandson. He loves to put them on and they match his helmet. Love this item.
customer_reviews.author: pandring

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My nine year old son received these for his birthday for his go kart. After the first time wearing them they had a rip in them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Est

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Five stars there perfect for my boy and there pocket rockets they love there helmets to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TMS Youth Kid Motocross Dirt Bike ATV Off-Road Gloves Red
product_meta.description: YOUTH MOTOCROSS DIRT BIKE / ATV GLOVES Item No. GV-MY-KID-RED Condition: Brand New Extra layer on palm for better grip & added comfort Adjustable velcro wrist closure Color: Red Size: Youth L(6 to 6-1/2" around the palm) Helpful Sizing Tips To get your size measurement please measure the circumference of the hand all the way around the palm and four knuckles in as straight of a line as possible. Do not include the thumb in the measurement. Then compare your measurement to the chart to find out what size you need.
feature_bullets: Item No. GV-MY-KID-RED Condition: Brand New
Extra layer on palm for better grip & added comfort Adjustable velcro wrist closure
Color: Red Size: Youth L(6 to 6-1/2" around the palm)

Helpful Sizing Tips To get your size measurement please measure the circumference of the hand all the way around the palm and four knuckles in as straight of a line as possible. Do not include the thumb in the measurement. Then compare your measurement to the chart to find out what size you need.
